insights.title: Significant Decrease in Quantity Purchased
insights.observation: Your quantity purchased decreased by 20.32% compared to the previous period, while historically it has increased by 158.26%.
insights.recommendation: Investigate the reasons behind the drop in quantity and consider strategies to increase order volume.

insights.title: Supplier Concentration Risk
insights.observation: You currently have only 1 supplier, which is significantly below the industry median of 1 and your historical average of 10.
insights.recommendation: Diversify your supplier base to mitigate risks associated with supplier concentration.

insights.title: Increased Average Price per Unit
insights.observation: Your average price per unit has risen by 41.14% compared to the previous period, while historically it has increased by 1313.71%.
insights.recommendation: Review pricing agreements with suppliers and explore alternative suppliers to manage costs.

insights.title: Low Spending Compared to Industry
insights.observation: Your total purchases of $13,526,609.38 are below the industry median of $531,780.99, indicating you are in the bottom 25% of spenders.
insights.recommendation: Consider increasing your procurement activities to align more closely with industry norms.

insights.title: Dramatic Shift in Product Variety
insights.observation: You purchased only 7 items in the current period, down from 13 previously, which is a 46.15% decrease.
insights.recommendation: Reassess your product needs and consider expanding your product range to improve procurement efficiency.

insights.title: High Average Spend per Supplier
insights.observation: Your average purchase per supplier is $13,526,609.38, significantly higher than the industry average of $6,572,804.24.
insights.recommendation: Evaluate if this concentration is beneficial or if it poses a risk, and consider negotiating better terms with multiple suppliers.
